title: TDBS The Dustpan and Brush Store Professional Tea Towels for Drying Glass Plates & Cutlery - 50cm x 70cm Cotton Kitchen Towel Set, Dish Cloth Absorbent Fibres, TeaTowels - Pack of 10
features: Premium Towel Set - Our kitchen towels are crafted from 100% cotton, offering exceptional quality and durability. This tea towel set features a classic blue stripe design, perfect for adding a touch of elegance to any kitchen decor.

Highly Absorbent Fibres - These glass cloths tea towels are designed with absorbent fibres to ensure efficient drying. Ideal for use as dish towels, these teatowels for kitchen effortlessly handle all your drying needs in both home and restaurant settings.

Versatile Use - From catering to home use, these t towels packs 10 provides ample supply. These cotton tea towels are perfect for cafes, bakeries, and kitchens, offering reliable performance as both kitchen tea towels and dish towels.

Large Tea Towels - Measuring 50cm x 70cm, these tea towels pack offers ample coverage for drying dishes. The t towels are ideal for handling large tasks, making them a must-have for any kitchen requiring practicality and style.

Elegant Design - Our blue white tea towels feature a classic design that complements any kitchen. These tea towels cotton are not only functional but also aesthetically pleasing, making them a great addition to any kitchen tea towels collection.
description: Product Description TDBS Blue Kitchen Tea Towel - Pack of 10 Designed to quickly soak up water and spills, these cotton tea towels are perfect for dish drying, cleaning, and prepping. Multi-Purpose Kitchen Towel Set Use as dish towels , tea towels , kitchen towels , or decorative accents in cafes, bakeries, or catering setups. Previous page Easy to Use Absorbent Fibres Soft, absorbent, and long-lasting cotton tea towels perfect for everyday use. High Quality Material 100% Cotton Crafted from soft, absorbent natural fibres, these cotton kitchen towels are ideal for drying. Professional Style Classic Stripe Design Clean and professional style, suitable for catering tea towels, café cloths, or modern home décor. For Multiple Uses Pack of 10 A value-packed set of t towels packs 10, ideal for high-use environments like restaurants & kitchen. Next page 1 Absorbent Fibres 2 100% Cotton 3 Classic Stripe Design 4 Pack of 10 Versatile Blue Tea Towels For Home, Restaurant, Bakery, Cafe etc Upgrade your kitchen essentials with this pack of 10 Blue Tea Towels, crafted from 100% cotton for excellent absorbency and durability. These cotton tea towels for kitchen feature a classic blue stripe design, making them ideal for any home, café, bakery, or catering setting. Each kitchen towel measures a generous 50cm x 70cm, perfect for drying dishes, cleaning surfaces, or handling hot cookware. Are these blue tea towels 100% cotton and machine washable? Yes, they’re made from 100% cotton, making them super absorbent and machine washable – ideal cotton tea towels for kitchen UK users. How big are the tea towels in this pack? Each towel measures 50cm x 70cm, making them large tea towels perfect for drying dishes, handling hot pans, or wiping surfaces. Can these tea towels be used in a commercial kitchen or café? Absolutely! These catering tea towels are durable enough for cafés, restaurants, bakeries, and home kitchens alike. Are they thick and absorbent enough for drying glassware and dishes? Yes, their soft cotton weave is ideal for glassware, making them excellent glass cloths tea towels and dish towels for drying dishes. Do they come with a hanging loop or are they easy to store? These kitchen towels cotton are easy to fold and store, and some may include a hanging loop for convenience, depending on the batch.
